description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Adaptive Property Layout component.

breakpoints.description: Defines the screen size breakpoints for this column definition.
breakpoints.label: Breakpoints

componentProps.description: Defines arbitrary Component properties that may be applicable to a specific Component Type.
componentProps.label: Component Props

object.description: The object, containing the property, to be displayed by the Adaptive Property Layout component.
object.label: Object

propertyName.description: The property name in the object to be displayed by the Adaptive Property Layout component.
propertyName.label: Property Name
